sentences.sContent: "Maybe a hyena chewed off the face soon after it died, " White said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Maybe a hyena chewed off the face soon after it died, " White said.
sentences.sCn: “也许在它死后不久，土狼就咬掉了它的面部，”怀特说。

sentences.sContent: He couldn’t see the hyena, but the stench of it was there, the stagnant reek of meat and sweat and piss.
sentences.sContent_eng: He couldn’t see the hyena, but the stench of it was there, the stagnant reek of meat and sweat and piss.
sentences.sCn: 他看不见鬣狗，但是他能嗅到它身上的恶臭，那混杂着肉味、汗味和尿骚的恶臭。

sentences.sContent: I have never had the pleasure of examining the private parts of a hyena, but from what I’m told, the females have something that so resembles a penis it makes mating downright tricky.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have never had the pleasure of examining the private parts of a hyena, but from what I’m told, the females have something that so resembles a penis it makes mating downright tricky.
sentences.sCn: 我对检查鬣狗的私处从来没有什么兴趣，但根据别处听来的说法，雌性鬣狗也有一个很像雄性生殖器的部位，使得交配活动变得颇为微妙。

trans.tranOther: a wild animal like a dog that makes a sound like a laugh
